alert.note: Alert for Hood; Palo Pinto; Parker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Parker, east central Palo Pinto and northeastern Hood Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 730 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brock, or 12 miles southeast of Mineral Wells. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mineral Wells, Granbury, Brock, Western Lake, Cool, Oak Trail Shores, Horseshoe Bend, Millsap, Stockton Bend, Waples, New Salem, Brock Junction, Dennis, Lake Granbury, Bennett, Tin Top and Brazos. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 385 and 403. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
